so up until recently until the new AWS VPN solution was launched each time a

so you must be wondering how would this benefit your architecture so the new VPN
solution provides customers a higher of a higher scalability and flexibility

your tunnel IP addressing that issue will no longer occur along with that
with the classic VPN connectivity option if you create a VPN connection using the
